nodes.name: AuctionFactory

nodes.documentation: @notice Pauses ability to deploy new auctions, does not affect existing auctions
nodes.name: pauseFactory

nodes.documentation: @notice Resumes ability to deploy new auctions
nodes.name: unpauseFactory
getAddresses

attributes.name: AuctionFactory

attributes.documentation: @notice Pauses ability to deploy new auctions, does not affect existing auctions
attributes.name: pauseFactory

attributes.documentation: @notice Resumes ability to deploy new auctions

getAddresses

getAuctionInvited

devdoc.author: Michael S. Mueller
devdoc.details: AuctionFactory inherits ProxyFactory to allow minimal proxy deploy of Auction instancesAuctionFactory inherits Pausable to allow admin to pause deploy of new Auction instances

createAuction(address,uint256,address).details: Uses minimal proxy deployMinimal functiontokenContractAddress should be contract address of deployed ERC-20 token for network

params.logic: address of pre-deployed Auction contract to be cloned
params.tokenAmount: uint number of tokens being auctioned, assumed 18 decimal precision
params.tokenContractAddress: contract address of token being auction, assumed ERC-20

getAddresses().details: Used in testing but not in frontend
getAddresses().return: Array of addresses of deployed auctions

getAuctionBy().details: Used in frontend to allow user to interact with their auction
getAuctionBy().return: Auction address which sender has deployed

getAuctionInvited().details: Used in frontend to allow user to interact with auction they have been invited to
getAuctionInvited().return: Auction address which sender has been invited to

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

registerBidder(address).details: Only may be called by existing deployed Auction

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

devdoc.title: Gloom - contracts to auction off ERC-20 tokens to the highest bidder (in ETH)AuctionFactory contract, to be used in conjunction with Auction and Escrow contracts

getAuctionBy().notice: Get auction deployed by a seller

getAuctionInvited().notice: Get auction to which a bidder has been invited

pauseFactory().notice: Pauses ability to deploy new auctions, does not affect existing auctions

registerBidder(address).notice: Registers bidder that has been invited to an Auction

unpauseFactory().notice: Resumes ability to deploy new auctions

userdoc.notice: This MVP is designed to handle one auction or one auction invite per addressThis is a demo, do not use on mainnet
